website_summaries.verdict: Bose SoundLink Mini II remains one the few standout products in the ultracompact wireless speaker category, featuring a top-notch design and very good sound for its tiny size.
pros: The Bose SoundLink Mini II is a very sleek, compact wireless Bluetooth speaker that sounds great for its small size
It also has excellent build quality with a unibody aluminum enclosure, and it includes a charging cradle that you can leave plugged in
cons: There's no real stereo separation, and you can't pair two speakers together

customer_reviews.title: Great combination--Bose and Dot!
customer_reviews.text: Having been frustrated with the terrible sound and size of the Echo, ordered the Soundlink II packaged with a Echo Dot. Problem solved! For a tiny package, the sound is fantastic, bell clear, and the bass is incredible for such a small enclosure. I couldn't be happier. The two sit unobtrusively, speaker under my display and Dot to the side, low profile and inconspicuous. Although not marketed as such, I think the Dot's sound is as good as the Echo. BTW, no conflicts, just a satisfied consumer. Now all I have to do is figure out what to do with a surplus Echo. Paperweight, perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: jowct

customer_reviews.title: i gave three is because i did like it. it small but with good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: i gave three is because i did like it. it small but with good sound quality...BUT; sadly i had it changed because the 1st one i got only last for two months ..then the battery just kinda ...dying? it stuck at 60% then just refuse to get charged further..so Amazon quickly replace a one for me...and the same thing happened again...so they suggest me just return it and get full refund, which i did got the money back. basically i think its a batch lot problem... so i have quite faith on Bose's products; or maybe just bad luck for me. FYI
customer_reviews.author: srijane

customer_reviews.title: One Ongoing and a New Dumb Design Aspect
customer_reviews.text: Two stars marked down for two dumb design flaws. First is the charging base that doesn't have suitable reliable connectivity when you put the unit into it. You struggle for it to connect to the pins correctly. Second is a lack of a lit function button so you can't see it when a call comes in the dark to answer it. I would have expected Bose to make a better leap from the original, especially the unreliable base, to this version.
customer_reviews.author: CAPT Seabee

customer_reviews.title: What else can I say?  It's a Bose.  =)
customer_reviews.text: One of the highest quality in sound and engineering all bundled up in one neat solid little package. With the new improvements (longer lasting batteries, powerful, clean audio experience from a tiny speaker-in speakerphone, the ability to connect to two Bluetooth devices simultaneously -- including Alexa). Hands down, in the world of portable bluetooth speakers, Bose is still head and shoulders above the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Candlewick96

customer_reviews.title: Will replace a stereo
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new house. I have a bulky old CD/DVD surround sound system. I got this in an echo dot bundle and put it in my bedroom. I have to tell you with the two Bose speakers I have I just don't need the bulky stereo system I have. Plus with all the wires and mess I just prefer to go this way. This has a charging dock so if I want to sit on the deck I can just bring the speaker with me. Works with the Echo Dot so I can ask Alexa to play certain music and it is just too easy
customer_reviews.author: Denver1925

customer_reviews.title: I bought one for my girl friend and won her love from 3000 miles away
customer_reviews.text: I heard it at my son's home and even from a distance I knew it had to be Bose. Sure enough it is. I bought one for my girl friend and won her love from 3000 miles away, and I bought one for myself as well The shape is great and the sound is great. Can't go wrong even if it does cost a lot more than the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Stay Paired With Echo Dot or Echo Spot
customer_reviews.text: This thing has NEVER been easy to pair at all. I thought it was my Dot, but I tried 2 others with it and it will not retain a pair. Same thing with the Spot. I have read everything I can on it and apparently this is not an isolated instance. I have even tried pairing it through a wire, and that doesn't even work. I give up. Done with Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Federal

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in small form factor.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this little speaker. Works great and has a big sound from a small form factor. Gets good amount of usage on a charge but is a little flaky at times when charging it. Overall was worth the money imo.
customer_reviews.author: Dakar

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: The quality of sound was good. We used this only with Echo Dot device for better sound Quality. 2 years (almost 200.00) and now dead....no way to charge - no way to reset - S.O.L.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Just play the musi
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound. I use it as a speaker in a pretty large (400 sqf) room and nothing is lost. It was easy to set up and change the device that I use to play music. I assume it would be very convenient to take to a trip or a picnic (even though I haven't done it). But the battery last for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Vessi

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard in speakers...period!
customer_reviews.text: After having my Bose Soundlink Mini Bluetooth Speaker I for a year, and having my son borrow it too many times I bought him his own bundled with the Echo Dot. He loves it as much as I do and now I can have mine back! Every other speaker is measured by how it compares to the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: USNA 70

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe how much sound comes out of this little machine. It was so easy to hook up to several of my devices. It literally took only a few minutes to set up. What a great price for the sound you would expect out of Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D (Fuhngirl)

customer_reviews.title: Big rich sound Little Box
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful rich sound, it makes the echo dot a real delight to listen to. My Mom loves 40's big band and Frank Sinatra, so this is something she can move around the house wherever she is and she enjoys the music daily.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Love Bose - but had to send this defective one ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Bose - but had to send this defective one back. They sent a new one but it was a bit of a challenge with me having to make numerous phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: chris gianni

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sauce, as my daughter says. This is a great unit with excellent sound. We have it linked to Alexa and we take this with us into what ever room we are relaxing or entertaining in. Exactly what you expect from a Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: Brucks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product with quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: We use this speaker every day to listen to music during meals. It syncs with no problem to our iPhones and even can work with Amazon alexa. Amazing sound and convenient portability around the house. Mom and dad just got one for Christmas, too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gardella

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great, but is far too weak for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The most overrated product I have ever bought on Amazon. This speaker is barely loud enough to fill a living room and is thoroughly over-matched by the cheaper (although bulkier) JBL Charge that I was testing right beside it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Furmuzan

customer_reviews.title: Great, loud speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker sure packs some loud sound! Very portable, but heavy! I wasn't expecting this little speaker to be so heavy, but it is. I guess that's an indicator or quality, though. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speaker
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sounding speaker for such a small package. I absolutely love it. So portable too!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bose Mini Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bose Mini Bluetooth. Use it with the Amazon "Dot". Will also be using it a lot this summer to take outside while we are doing yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Day

customer_reviews.title: The highs are more cutoff than I would like, and some music the mids do get muddled
customer_reviews.text: Loving it. The highs are more cutoff than I would like, and some music the mids do get muddled, but overall it's a good speaker and can get really loud without too much distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: If you haven't heard this in person, you'll be amazed!
customer_reviews.text: Youtube videos don't do this thing justice. It's really unbelievable sound out of this little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: briko3

customer_reviews.title: Compact size - Amazing sound.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality for the size. Long battery life. Easily fits in my pocket and with media on my phone, I can take sound wherever I go
customer_reviews.author: Mike Scott

customer_reviews.title: A MUST.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my Lord the sound that this can make. You HAVE to hear it for yourself. Treat yourself and buy one! You WON'T be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Matt West

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but Great Sound.
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but produces some awesome sound for its size. The battery life is pretty exceptional as well even when played at full volume.
customer_reviews.author: The Alvises

customer_reviews.title: Great for Echo Dot
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use with an Echo Dot. It works great. It was easy to link to both Dot and iPhone, and the sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: S Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful sound from such a small speaker! The charge lasts quite a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: LvIII Civ

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved this speaker so much that he bought a second one for his office.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this speaker so much that he bought a second one for his office.

customer_reviews.title: This is really easy to use except there is some BT connectivity where ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to use except there is some BT connectivity where the audio cracks and cuts in and out with a variety of devices I have connected it to
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lue

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great bass and even sound and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great bass and even sound and very realistic for a small speaker. Worth twice the price.Shhhh don't tell Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Bose.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Heavy, feels substantial. One month ownership, battery still working well.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestGamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this little baby is awesome! The battery life is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with the Echo!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound and a small profile which is perfect for my nightstand. Easy to pair with the Echo.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound from such a tiny speaker. Easily fills an 800 square foot room

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this...have waited a long time to purchase a BOSE. So, I am just thrilled!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love mu Boss mini speaker. Great sound without being big and bulky.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth and loud enough for me to hear... Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Took me a bit of getting used to but I now have a working with my echo tap and I'm enjoying it

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to accompany our Amazon Dot. Its a perfect pairing!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound quality but volume lacking
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound quality but volume lacking. I bought an Angel for 1/4 of price with comparable sound quality and rockable volume.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and can take to other places in the house to enjoy!

customer_reviews.title: Tiny package, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Tiny package gives out clear tones with great base. Holds up fairly well tocrsnked volume. Use it on my office desk paired with a Dot
customer_reviews.author: GMan

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Mini Bluetooth Speaker II (Carbon)
product_meta.description: Color:Carbon| Style:SoundLink Mini IIIt's the small speaker with the big, big voice. The SoundLink Mini Bluetooth speaker II delivers full sound with dramatically deeper lows than you'd expect from a speaker that fits in the palm of your hand. And because it's wireless and ultra-compact, it's easy to take Bose sound anywhere. The SoundLink Mini II has a built-in speakerphone, so you can take calls out loud with clear sound. And voice prompts talk you through Bluetooth pairing, so connecting to your music is easy. The speaker's lithium-ion battery provides up to 10 hours of unplugged playtime, and it can be conveniently charged from most USB power sources. At home, the included cradle keeps the speaker charged while serving as a home base, so it's always ready to grab and go. The SoundLink Mini II was engineered to stand up to everyday use and be placed almost anywhere. It connects wirelessly to your Bluetooth enabled devices--up to two at a time. The SoundLink Mini II is available in Carbon or Pearl and can be customized with colored accessory covers to fit your unique style. Included: SoundLink Mini Bluetooth speaker II; charging cradle; wall charger; cable.
feature_bullets: Wireless and ultra compact so you can take Bose sound anywhere, Bluetooth Transmission Range Up to 30'
Built in speakerphone lets you take calls out loud; Lithium ion battery plays up to 10 hours on full charge
Voice prompts talk you through Bluetooth pairing, so it's super easy
Note: Certain mobile devices may not support these functions. Kindly check User manual on Product Information for Troubleshooting steps
Big sound with deep bass for a full range listening experience
